mapper.select: SELECT sum(if (f.praise_stat =${@com.github.jakicdong.techub.api.model.enums.PraiseStatEnum@PRAISE.code}, 1, 0)) as praiseCount, sum(if (f.collection_stat =${@com.github.jakicdong.techub.api.model.enums.CollectionStatEnum@COLLECTION.code}, 1, 0)) as collectionCount, sum(if (f.read_stat =${@com.github.jakicdong.techub.api.model.enums.ReadStatEnum@READ.code}, 1, 0)) as readCount, sum(if (f.comment_stat =${@com.github.jakicdong.techub.api.model.enums.CommentStatEnum@COMMENT.code}, 1, 0)) as commentCount FROM user_foot AS f
